items.sentence: Tom still isn\'t entirely comfortable with this.
Maybe all of Tom\'s suggestions weren\'t stupid.
Tom told Mary that he didn\'t have enough money.
Are you sure you don\'t want me to say anything?
Are you sure you don\'t want to go see a doctor?
Are you sure you don\'t want to stay for dinner?
Are you telling me you\'ve never been to Boston?
I wish you hadn\'t told that story to my mother.
I wish you were wrong, but I know you\'re right.
I wonder what they\'re whispering to each other.
